Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Class RemoteView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.RemoteView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer<ServerMessage>
Direct Known Subclasses:
NetworkRemoteView, OfflineRemoteView
public abstract class RemoteView
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observer<ServerMessage>
This abstract class represents View component in MVC architectural pattern, it is bound to a specific user. It is a Game observer and gets notified whenever model changes. It also as a reference to a GameController instance, in this way it forwards message handling to it.
